about_the_game:
This DLC adds the NES ROM to your Lizard installation. You can use this to play the game in an appropriate emulator.

The downloaded files can be found in the application's "local files" (see properties) in the NES folder.
detailed_description:
This DLC adds the NES ROM to your Lizard installation. You can use this to play the game in an appropriate emulator.

The downloaded files can be found in the application's "local files" (see properties) in the NES folder.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or later recommended, 32-bit or 64-bit
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or later
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

name: Lizard NES ROM

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2, Vista, 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz (SSE2)
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

short_description: An NES ROM for Lizard that you can use with your favourite emulator.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain
